title: Ready to go Res Lease in San Marcos. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Beautiful newly renovated 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom, 2-story home in San Marcos, TX, now available to lease!
Conveniently located close to shopping and main highways.
Entering the front door, you’ll find yourself in a spacious living room with brand new elegant floating wood vinyl planking and ceiling fans to help cool the home in hot summer months.
The well-designed kitchen is perfect for those who love to cook; with its refined wood cabinetry, an island, plenty of counter and storage space, pantry, and a two-windowed view to the private yard.
Huge Primary BR features a sitting area, walk-in closets and an upstairs balcony.
Splendid and relaxing times will be had in your fenced backyard, with an open patio and green areas just waiting for you!
Tour and apply to this one before it’s gone!
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package- reach out for more details.
This property is zoned as a single family home so no more than two unrelated people can live in the property.
